question: Which state has recently decided to introduce English medium from 1<sup>st</sup>- 8<sup>th</sup> standard in government schools?
explanation: Andhra Pradesh state government is to introduce English medium from standard first to standard eight in government schools. This will come into existence for standards I to VIII from the academic year 2020-21 and for standards IX and X from the academic year 2021-22. The move aims to revive the English Language Teaching Centers and District English Centers and relocate them to District Institutes for Education and Training.
